2074.subject: HCOM
2074.descrlong: Prepares students to write news articles for the mass media. Covers concepts of journalistic interviewing, information gathering, critical understanding of news sources, ethical decision making, and the process of writing news, editorial, and feature articles for print and electronic media. Otter Realm students are strongly encouraged to enroll. Requires successful completion of coursework that satisfies the ENCOM A ULR. (Offered every year.)
